data.text: Nan borim, kɨ nɨn sure damuamin akar gavgavir kam nɨ a bakɨnɨghnɨghan markɨ.
Nɨ akar kamɨn gɨn mangɨva, egh nɨ dughiar ruarimɨn nguazimɨn ikɨva,
Egh nɨ gumazir igharazibagh ifongezir arazim ko, igharaziba ko poroghav itir arazim ataghɨraghan markɨ.
Egh nɨ kamaghɨn damigh, God ko gumazamizibar damazimɨn ziar ekiam iniam,
Nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ikɨ.
Bizir nɨ bar amiba, nɨ Ikiavɨra Itir Godra nɨghnɨgh egh dar amu,
Nɨ suam, nan fofozimra a guizbangɨn bizim. Puvatɨ.
Nɨ kamaghɨn damutɨ, arazir kam bar deraghvɨra nɨn akuragham,
Egh nɨ uan azenimɨn faragha mɨtɨghizir dagheba inigh ofan mɨn da isɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God danɨngigh,
Egh nɨ kamaghɨn damutɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir God nɨn azenibar daghebar amutɨ da otiv, dagher avɨriba ikiam.
Nan borim, Ikiavɨra Itir God arazir kurar manam bagh nɨ akɨrtɨ,
Guizbangɨra, gumazamizir Ikiavɨra Itir God ifongeziba a me akɨrmɨsi,
Gumazim nɨghnɨzir aghuim ko fofozim ini,
Guizbangɨra, nɨghnɨzir aghuim bar deragha
Nɨghnɨzir aghuim, dagɨar aghuir bar pɨn koziba bar dagh afira.
Nɨghnɨzir aghuim nɨn akurvaghtɨ, nɨ dughiar ruarimɨn nguazimɨn ikiam.
Nɨghnɨzir aghuim zurara nɨn navim damutɨ an amɨragh ikiam.
Nɨghnɨzir aghuim, mati temer ikɨrɨmɨrir aghuim anɨdimɨn mɨn iti.
Ikiavɨra Itir God nɨghnɨzir aghuimɨn nguazir kamɨn ingari,
Egha nɨghnɨzir aghuimɨn dɨpar ekiar nguazir averiamɨn itim gamizɨ an akariaghɨrɨgha anabo.
Nan borim, nɨ bar deragh gan, egh uan nɨghnɨzir aghuim ko tuaviba tuisɨzir arazimɨn suiragh gavgavigh,
Nɨghnɨzir aghuim ko fofozim ikɨrɨmɨrir ruarim nɨ danɨngɨva,
Eghtɨ nɨ deraghvɨra tuavimɨn mangɨtɨ,
Egh nɨ akuir dughiamɨn nɨ atiatingan kogham.
Eghtɨ dughiar kuram zuamɨram otogh gumazir kurabagh asɨghasɨghtɨ, nɨ atiatingan markɨ.
Nɨ fo, nɨ nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ikɨ,
Eghtɨ gumazitam bizitam puvatɨgh egh uabɨ danɨngɨsɨ nɨn azangsɨghtɨ,
Eghtɨ nɨ uan namakamɨn akurvaghamin tuavitam ikɨva, nɨ datɨrɨghɨn an akurvagh. Nɨ kamaghɨn a mɨkɨman markɨ,
Nɨn namakar nɨn boroghɨra itiba, nɨ pazɨ me damusɨ nɨghnɨghan markɨ.
Nɨ gumazir arazir kuratam nɨ gamizir puvatɨzir tam,
Nɨ igharaz darazigh asɨghasɨsir gumazamizibar ganɨva men biziba bagh navim dɨkavan markɨ.
Guizbangɨra, Ikiavɨra Itir God uabɨ gumazir arazir kurabagh amibagh ifongezir puvatɨ.
Ikiavɨra Itir God ghaze, gumazir kuraba uan amuiroghboriba sara bar arɨghiregham.
Gumazir uari fava dɨbovir akabar igharaz daraziv geiba, God dɨbovir akaba me mɨkɨm me ikarvagham.
Gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba itiba, ziar ekiaba iniam.
